reviews.author: Verified Customer
reviews.text: Beautiful location on the Planufer, super friendly staff and very tasty food and drinks. The vegan organic chocolate tap is unique!

reviews.author: Coffee Enthusiast
reviews.text: The best coffee I have had so far in Berlin. Direct trade beans from Nicaragua really make a difference. The French toast sandwich is always a great choice.

reviews.author: Local Berliner
reviews.text: Cozy, charming caf√© with excellent vegan options. Perfect spot for working on your laptop. The atmosphere by the canal is unbeatable.
